summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block "A", Rowe's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, being the alley between Bellevue Avenue North and the north line of said Block "A" and the alley lying north of said Block "A", from Bellevue Avenue North to Melrose Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle by grading the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 857 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
